name: Hybrid-Rotary-Matrix
concept: Central rotary knob with button grid on sides
prompt:
Design a VibeDeck controller that combines a large central rotary knob with a button grid.

Features:
- Large premium rotary encoder in the center (brushed aluminum, knurled grip)
- 6 LCD buttons arranged in 2 rows of 3 on the left side
- 6 LCD buttons arranged in 2 rows of 3 on the right side
- Small OLED display above the rotary showing current selection
- Bottom row: 4 action buttons (YES, NO, microphone, SEND)
- Wider rectangular form factor to accommodate both elements
- Dark gray housing with cyan LED accents
- USB-C with coiled cable

Style: Professional product photography, clean studio lighting, slight overhead angle, neutral background. Device fills 70% of frame. Premium tech aesthetic.
design_rationale: Combines the best of both worlds - rotary for quick navigation and button matrix for direct access. Tests if hybrid approach offers better UX than pure rotary or pure matrix.
